name: Black Orchid
additionalNotes:
Carlito Fuente saw a “Black Orchid” flower at an arboretum which inspired him to create this very interesting and ornate vitola (proprietary Sun Grown "13" wrapper, unreleased, c. 2008, this "very full, strong" cigar was included in the 2010 CFCF box).

http://cigarsmoke.org/?p=1335
